name: The Fight 2 Alpha
description:
The Fight 2 is game similar to Super Smash bros your goal is to hit your friend out of range (the only mode that works is the classic mode and there just use the lives mode the other isn´t working yet)

if something doesn´t work write a command. I will try to help you

To play this game you need a controller 

I´ve testet it wtih a X input Controller(X boc Controller)

The Controls:

green button = normal hit

red Button = special

left stick = walk

left stick press = run

walk/run and green button = dash attack

blue Button = shield

yellow Button jump(you have multible jumps in the air)

right stick in any direction = heavy attack(you can charge it)

pause the game (start Button)

Just Play it. 

It´s free so, Play it !!!

I would be very happy if you Rate this game(pleace keep in mind this game isn´t nearly finished)

This game was Developed by myself Maximilian Fischer

I used Unity, Krita, Blender and Visual Studio to create this game
